metadata.title: CVE-2019-5885 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
Matrix Synapse before 0.34.0.1, when the macaroon_secret_key authentication parameter is not set, uses a predictable value to derive a secret key and other secrets which could allow remote attackers to impersonate users.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-5885` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

matrix-synapse - 0.34.1.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: matrix-synapse package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.34.1.1-1').
